long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Chatstrike Recruit extension works on any page and is integrated with LinkedIn.

- Visit a candidate profile on LinkedIn.
- Click the Chatstrike extension; the fields are automatically populated.
- Click Create Chat.
- Copy chat link into your outbound message to the candidate.
- Be notified in Slack when the candidate clicks the link.
- Chat with the candidate right from Slack.

Note: a Chatstrike account is required to use this extension.
